item.title: Republican Rep. LaMalfa dies, further narrowing GOP’s House majority
item.description: The death of the seven-term congressman, coupled with Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene’s vacating her seat Tuesday, means Republicans are likely to face tr...

item.title: More than 2 million Epstein documents still unreleased, officials say
item.description: In a progress report of sorts, U.S. officials say about 12,300 Epstein documents have been reviewed and released. There are some 2 million to go.

item.title: Lawmakers battle over how — and whether — Jan. 6 should be remembered
item.description: House Republicans continue to hide a plaque honoring the police who defended the Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021, almost three years after a law passed requir...

item.title: George Conway, critical of Trump, enters crowded Democratic House primary
item.description: In an interview, the newly registered Democrat emphasized his opposition to the president, as he seeks to stand out in a packed open race in New York.

item.title: Maduro, making first court appearance, says U.S. ‘kidnapped’ him
